thread.title: Court stops Botswana deporting Eritrean soccer players
thread.title_full: Court stops Botswana deporting Eritrean soccer players

title: Court stops Botswana deporting Eritrean soccer players
text:
Court stops Botswana deporting Eritrean soccer players Associated Press | 0 comments 
GABORONE, Botswana (AP) — A group of 10 players from Eritrea's national football team that are claiming asylum in Botswana after a World Cup qualifier have won a temporary reprieve, with a court ruling they shouldn't be sent back home. 
The court said Friday the players could stay temporarily and will have their asylum case heard on Dec. 11. kAm%96 A=2J6CD C67FD65 E@ C6EFC?
